screens.mainText: The following questions ask about how you feel RIGHT NOW.
On the following screens are descriptions of specific feelings you might be experiencing. Please rate how well each describes what you feel RIGHT NOW.
How HAPPY do you feel right now?
How TENSE/ANXIOUS do you feel right now?
How much ENJOYMENT/FUN do you feel right now?
How DEPRESSED/BLUE do you feel right now?
The next questions ask about significant events that happened since the last assessment.
Did anything stressful occur since the last assessment? A stressful event is any event, even a minor one, which negatively affected you.
How would you describe this stressful event?  If more than one event happened, please pick the most significant event.
How unpleasant was this ARGUMENT/CONFLICT/DISAGREEMENT for you?
How much have you thought about this ARGUMENT/CONFLICT/DISAGREEMENT since it happened?
How unpleasant was this FINANCIAL EVENT for you?
How much have you thought about this FINANCIAL EVENT since it happened?
How unpleasant was this HOME-RELATED EVENT for you?
How much have you thought about this HOME-RELATED EVENT since it happened?
How unpleasant was this WORK-RELATED EVENT for you?
How much have you thought about this WORK-RELATED EVENT since it happened?
How unpleasant was this HEALTH EVENT OR ACCIDENT for you?
How much have you thought about this HEALTH EVENT OR ACCIDENT since it happened?
How unpleasant was this EVENT THAT HAPPENED TO OTHERS for you?
How much have you thought about this EVENT THAT HAPPENED TO OTHERS since it happened?
How unpleasant was this OTHER EVENT for you?
How much have you thought about this OTHER EVENT since it happened?
Why do you think nothing stressful happened to you since the last assessment?

inputs.label: Stressful things don't usually happen to me
I handled situations before they became stressful

The following questions ask about your activities during the past 5 minutes.
How FRUSTRATED do you feel right now?
How unpleasant was this TRAFFIC OR TRANSPORTATION EVENT for you?
How much have you thought about this TRAFFIC OR TRANSPORTATION EVENT since it happened?
The next questions ask about what was on your mind while you were doing chores during the past 5 minutes.
The next questions ask about what was on your mind while you were doing work-related activities during the past 5 minutes.
The next questions ask about what was on your mind while you were socializing during the past 5 minutes.
The next questions ask about what was on your mind while you were eating/drinking during the past 5 minutes.
The next questions ask about what was on your mind while you were being physically active during the past 5 minutes.
The next questions ask about what was on your mind while you were involved in recreation during the past 5 minutes.
The next questions ask about what was on your mind while you were doing self-care during the past 5 minutes.
The next questions ask about what was on your mind while you were resting during the past 5 minutes.
The next questions ask about what was on your mind while you were doing something else during the past 5 minutes.
